DOC.brief_summary: There three purpose study : I. establish construct validity ( via factor analysis ) Inventory Assessing Process Cultural Competence Among Healthcare Professionals - Student Version ( IAPCC-SV ) II . determine responsiveness IAPCC-SV III . investigate demographic predictor variables IAPCC-SV It hypothesize : I. variable load one component , component represent number strongly load variable II . IAPCC-SV demonstrate responsiveness , evidence significantly high post-module IAPCC-SV score experimental group compare control group III . cultural composite score race significant predictor IAPCC-SV score
DOC.brief_title: Construct Validity , Responsiveness , Demographic Predictors IAPCC-SV
